body:
Hey everyone! Galrandir here and this will be the place to ask for an outro! To get an outro, though, you will have to fill out this question thingy:

  • A uncopyrighted song of your choice
  • A moving cinematic background (yes or no)
  • The video file (mp4, wmv, ect)
  • Your mc skin (yes or no)
  • A box for last video (yes or no)
  • How long (please specify)
  • How you want me to send it to you (email, Skype, ect)
  • If you want your name written at the top of it ( yes or no)
  • The date you want it to be done by (please specify)
  • Your youtube name


    • By the way, please credit me for making these outros.

    See my own outro here (Make sure to watch the PvP montage as well :p):

    https://youtu.be/6DmDnjGMOqc


    ~Galrandir

title: Youtube Outros!

replies.body: Do you have any examples that you could show us?
replies.body_tagged: Do you have any examples that you could show us?

replies.body: Yes, examples would help to see your ability.

That is outro, not intro. Outro = eZ 2 make.
Already have a guy making 1 (really good intro maker) tho.
So good luck :) Just saw the comment and wanted to comment on the reply xd
